assignments.description: Assigns purchase payload values that are independent of a partner or proposal type.
assignments.name: Assign_Shared_Payload_Values
assignments.label: Assign Shared Payload Values

constants.description: Current Paradigm Purchase API being used
constants.name: apiVersion

Flow.description: Adding Restatement Date for OPD and Proposal Name in payload - Moe 04.18.2025

formulas.name: BusDaysCalculator
formulas.expression: CASE( MOD(TODAY() - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, TODAY() + 29, 1, TODAY() + 31, 2, TODAY() + 31, 3, TODAY() + 31, 4, TODAY() + 31, 5, TODAY() + 33, 6, TODAY() + 32, TODAY() )

formulas.description: Value will be determined based on a Plan_Entry_Frequency__c
formulas.name: entry

formulas.description: Transforms the phone number to sting of XXXXXXXXXX
formulas.name: formattedPhone

formulas.description: Utilized for purchase payload mapping for api v2.7
formulas.name: permissibleWithdrawal

formulas.description: Utilized for purchase payload mapping for api v2.7
formulas.name: permissibleWithdrawalDays
planEffectiveDate
formulas.expression: IF( ISPICKVAL({!get_Proposal.Plan_Type__c}, "New Plan"), IF( ISPICKVAL({!get_Proposal.Prior_Year_Profit_Sharing_Contribution__c}, "Yes"), {!get_Proposal.Profit_Sharing_Plan_Effective_Date__c}, IF( ISPICKVAL({!get_Proposal.Prior_Year_Profit_Sharing_Contribution__c}, "No"), {!get_Proposal.Plan_Effective_Date__c}, IF( ISBLANK(TEXT({!get_Proposal.Prior_Year_Profit_Sharing_Contribution__c})), {!get_Proposal.Plan_Effective_Date__c}, NULL ) ) ), IF( ISPICKVAL({!get_Proposal.Plan_Type__c}, "Conversion Plan"), {!get_Proposal.Original_Effective_Date__c}, NULL ) )

formulas.description: This will be calculated based of Plan_Eligibilty__c value
formulas.name: serviceEligibility
formulas.expression: CASE(TEXT({!get_Proposal.Plan_Eligibility__c}), "Immediate", "IMMEDIATE", "One Month", "ONE_MONTH", "Two Months", "TWO_MONTHS", "Three Months", "THREE_MONTHS", "6 Months", "SIX_MONTHS", "1 Year (1000 Hours)", "ONE_YEAR_HOURS", "1 Year", "TWELVE_MONTHS", "" )

formulas.name: stateCode
formulas.expression: IF( LEN({!get_Proposal.Company_State__c}) = 2, {!get_Proposal.Company_State__c}, CASE({!get_Proposal.Company_State__c}, "Alabama", "AL", "Alaska", "AK", "Arizona", "AZ", "Arkansas", "AR", "California", "CA", "Colorado", "CO", "Connecticut", "CT", "Delaware", "DE", "Florida", "FL", "Georgia", "GA", "Hawaii", "HI", "Idaho", "ID", "Illinois", "IL", "Indiana", "IN", "Iowa", "IA", "Kansas", "KS", "Kentucky", "KY", "Louisiana", "LA", "Maine", "ME", "Maryland", "MD", "Massachusetts", "MA", "Michigan", "MI", "Minnesota", "MN", "Mississippi", "MS", "Missouri", "MO", "Montana", "MT", "Nebraska", "NE", "Nevada", "NV", "New Hampshire", "NH", "New Jersey", "NJ", "New Mexico", "NM", "New York", "NY", "North Carolina", "NC", "North Dakota", "ND", "Ohio", "OH", "Oklahoma", "OK", "Oregon", "OR", "Pennsylvania", "PA", "Rhode Island", "RI", "South Carolina", "SC", "South Dakota", "SD", "Tennessee", "TN", "Texas", "TX", "Utah", "UT", "Vermont", "VT", "Virginia", "VA", "Washington", "WA", "West Virginia", "WV", "Wisconsin", "WI", "Wyoming", "WY", "" ) )

Flow.label: Purchase API | Get Purchase Link

variables.description: A list of Sources to be added to the purchase Payload. Passed though a subflow
variables.name: addSources

variables.description: A list of Advisors (actors) for purchase Payload
variables.name: advisorActorsCollection

variables.description: Response Code from Advisor API callout
variables.name: advisorCalloutResponseCode

variables.description: Will be used to populate advisorsActorsCollection
variables.name: advisorsActorSingle

variables.description: Roles for PurchasePayload on Advisors section
variables.name: advisorsRolesCollection

variables.description: Advisors Collection to be sent via Advisor API
variables.name: advisorUsersCollection
